metadata.synopsis: Patron chatter on Elfsong Tavern - 'Ears' Oohna.

0.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
0.text: Still here, keeping my ear to the ground!
0.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

1.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
1.text: Don't tell me you're the one who rented out the whole upper floor! I hear the beds have been... well used.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

2.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
2.text: If you've come to the Elfsong to hear what's going on, never fear, because your girl Oohna hears everything.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the Absolute

3.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
3.text: That puffed-up parvenu Gortash, an Archduke? However did they find a crown big enough for his head?
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

4.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
4.text: Some people are still talking about the fall of Lorroakan, but I am past it.
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

5.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
5.text: The whisper is, Lord Gortash is dead! But if someone asks, you didn't hear it from me. Unless that someone has more juicy details!

6.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
6.text: I must pop over to the Sundries and, um, take in the sights!
6.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

7.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
7.text: If it isn't Good News on legs!
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

8.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
8.text: I hear Rolan, the new manager at the Sundries, has two absolutely scrumptious siblings.
8.context: InternalNodeContext: Rolan as new owner of Sorcerous Sundries

9.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
9.text: Did you hear the great rumbling from Grey Harbour when whatever it was that happened happened? I certainly did. Though of course, I hear everything.
9.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

10.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
10.text: Sleeping upstairs? Don't be surprised if you're awakened by the sound of ghostly elven singing!
10.context: InternalNodeContext: The players paid for exclusive use of Elfsong Tavern first floor.

11.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
11.text: Well, I, for one, won't miss those wretched Steel Watchers. The noise they made! So awful.

12.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
12.text: Not surprised Lorroakan should take a fall, a trashy dresser like him. No class whatsoever.
12.context: InternalNodeContext: Lorroakan has been deposed from Ramazith's Tower + no longer owns Sorcerous Sundries

13.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
13.text: Gortash may have made it to the throne, but from what I hear, he won't last long. Can't repeat it, though!
13.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

14.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
14.text: You're responsible for some good news for a change, from what I hear. Keep it up - we can all use some good news.
14.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

15.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
15.text: My ears are still ringing from that commotion in the harbour!
15.context: InternalNodeContext: Iron Throne Destruction (ie. vague trouble in harbour)

16.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
16.text: I just took a look, and the Steel Watchers are still off-duty, shall we say.

17.speaker: 'Ears' Oohna
17.text: I'm keeping my ears open for more about Gortash's death - if it's true.
